Title: Stop Azure V2 VMs
Summary: This Graphical PowerShell runbook connects to Azure using an Automation Run As account and stops all V2 VMs in an Azure subscription or in a resource group or a single named V2 VM.  You can attach a recurring schedule to this runbook to run it at a specific time.
Author: Azure Automation Product Team
UserTags: Azure Virtual Machines, Stop VM, GraphicalPS
